tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Doctor Who Prequel: Pond Life part 1 - Series 7 Autumn 2012 - BBC One
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: www.bbc.co.uk Pond Life is the new 5 part mini-adventure, with a new part every day, featuring the Doctor, Amy, Rory and some surprise familiar faces! En route to visit the Ponds the TARDIS' Helmic Regulator malfunctions, leaving the Doctor popping up everywhere in time and space. Will he ever make it back to them? Watch Asylum of the Daleks, the new Doctor Who adventure, on BBC One on Saturday 01 September at 7.20pm, and on: BBC America on Saturday 01 September at 9pm ET Space (Canada) on Saturday 01 September at 9pm ET ABC iView (Australia) on 02 September at 5.10am AEST ABC1 (Australia) on Saturday 08 September at 7.30pm AEST Prime (New Zealand) on Thursday 13th September at 8pm NZST
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Keyword: What is Doctor Who Pond Life

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: And the﻿ journey starts by clicking the "show the comment" hahah
You win. Stop the Internet. There is nothing﻿ else to see. Your comment is the best.
This is﻿ the extended version of the epic adventure. Click "show comment" for it!
David tenant way﻿ better but he is ok
Also featuring "Tick Tock (Goes The Clock)" feat. The Silence﻿
Ehh, at least she's not wearing it for the﻿ *actual* show (right?).
Track B of the album "Bowties R Cool" comes "Fez'z﻿ R Cool"... I don't know track's B don't exist but I wanted to play too :D
*** NEW OBAMA / ROMNEY SONG OUT " CALLED. ( POLITICAL COWBOYS SONG ) BY SINGER "STONE THUG" TELL A﻿ FRIEND ***

A show that proves that great writing and good acting overcomes cheap special effects. Perhaps Hollywood should﻿ take note. Less money on effects, more on better writers, directors, and real actors instead of insane celebrities.
should make slenderman episode check my channel to see who the﻿ slenderman is
Don't﻿ forget "Bowties R Cool ii: Fezzes are Cool" feat. Tommy Cooper
